column4: so, do we have any experts here on ATI drivers?

My screen looks like bad TV reception... I tried installing the restricted driver but that messes up--can't even login. I got the package from ATI website and that fixes nothing. My question is, what works and how can I get it? :(
I had it working previously under a Wubi install of Ubuntu 8.04
did you have a gui with the livecd?
I'd try to install 8.10 and see if it fixes my problems but the installer for 8.10 doesn't even recognize my keyboard.
I was able to insert the livecd > hit F4 >Safe video mode> then booted... I got a good gui..
...then I mounted the Ubuntu disk > then in terminal> sudo cp /etc/X11/xorg.conf /media/disk/etc/X11/xorg.conf
to fix the ATI issue or the installer issue? I asked two questions, lol
that gave me a workable gui
